Package javelin.view.screen

Class InfoScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • javelin.old.TPanel
            • javelin.old.Screen
              • javelin.view.screen.InfoScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntroScreen, SelectScreen, SquadScreen, StatisticsScreen
    public class InfoScreen
extends Screen
    Fullscreen text display. For hiding the current BattleScreen or WorldScreen and interacting textually with the user.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
